Class xml_template_cached 

xml_template
   |
   --xml_template_cached

Classes extended from xml_template_cached:

Located in File: Program_Root/text/xml/template_cached.class.php

Template wizard based on lib/xml_scanner.class. 
Saves first scanning pass for a template by storing the document trees in
 a SQL table. Use this like xml_template.
  • Package - Text
  • Access - public
